On May 15, 2021, I discovered what would soon become a truly burning passion. I bought a MacBook and told myself, "I'm going to become a programmer!", without even really knowing what that meant.

I began studying, took courses on my weekends, and just barely scraped together enough time to realize the level of satisfaction I could achieve by building a working piece of software. I also quickly realized that, if I was going to be able to really learn, I'd need more time; and so, just shy of a year later, I quit my job to study full-time.

From then on, I've had a growth factor of N2. But just what have I created?
